msg: Fixing accidental overwrite of changes for 1.3.0

author: lehors
msg: Since checking for readonly nodes is off when errorchecking is
off, we don't need to make entityref and entity nodes readwrite to build
them, on the other hand we must set them as readonly once built.
Also cleaned up some code by relying on fDocumentImpl and
fDeferredDocumentImpl to figure out what DOM implementation we're dealing with.

author: elena
msg: Actually we don't need to synchronize anything at this point...

author: elena
msg: Forgot to take care for non-xerces implementation of DOM. (DOM L3)
